Trade/Device Name(s): SOL-GUARD Safety Pull Button Collection Set
SOL-GUARD Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set
SOL-GUARD Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set with Pre-attached Holder
SOL-GUARD Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set with Luer Adapter
SOL-GUARD Safety Pull-Button IV Infusion Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for SOL-GUARD Safety Pull-Button Blood Collection Set, a sterile, multi-sample, single-use fixed winged blood collection set for venipuncture and short-term infusion with spring retractable safety needle.
Indications for Use Summary: Sterile, multi-sample, single-use fixed winged blood collection set intended for venipuncture to obtain blood specimens or short-term (up to 2 hours) single infusions, not to be left in place, and aids in the prevention of accidental needlestick injury via needle retraction.
